title: Iron &  Bronze
body:
New a Iron 4 - Bronze

Solo Duo / partner 

No Trolls please 

Need people motivated to play and want to have fun {{summoner:4}}

replies.body: Do you want to be carried out or are you just looking for a duo?
Yo I need some help too get from bronze 1 too silver bc of trolls can you help
Way to hitch a ride on someone else's bandwagon lol
true bc i have a friend who cannot seem to get out of iron 1 because the trolls he encounters, im a s2 smurf and by playing i know how they feel ::
ye i feel it atm man
Add me, I'll duo. IGN ~ Shorti Bronze 3 - or - Qræx Iron 1 ~ (æ is one character)
